long_description: The lightweight SealSkinz Walking socks feature waterproof, highly breathable membranes that'll keep your feet dry and comfortable when you're hiking or trail running on soggy, muddy trails. Seamless, close-fitting knit construction is ideal for light hiking and trail-running shoes; designed to come up to mid-calf height for good coverage in inclement weather. Fine acrylic/merino wool/nylon/spandex pile linings help wick moisture away from your feet and keep your toes warm. Elastic insteps and panels by the Achilles tendons provide support. Lightweight cushion. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The lightweight SealSkinz Walking socks feature waterproof, highly breathable membranes that'll keep your feet dry and comfortable when you're hiking or trail running on soggy, muddy trails.
